# Release Checklist

Before pushing to kenotron-ms:

- [x] Git repo initialized
- [x] All files committed
- [x] Clean code (passes python_check)
- [x] README.md complete
- [ ] Create GitHub repo: kenotron-ms/amplifier-module-tool-nano-banana
- [ ] Add remote
- [ ] Push to main

Commands:
```bash
# After creating repo on GitHub
git remote add origin git@github.com:kenotron-ms/amplifier-module-tool-nano-banana.git
git push -u origin main
```
